question: 修理
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Discipline</kanji> is the <kanji>reason</kanji> why you're able to do a <vocabulary>repair</vocabulary> on things. It takes a lot of time to fix something, and takes a lot of studying. That discipline is what you need, and you have it. Thus, it was <vocabulary>repair</vocabulary>ed!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
